name: Trials (Alberto Alvarado)
description:
After the trials, events start beginning to occur.  Feeling tremendous guilt and denial, you must find a way to be rid of the creatures that lurk in the dark. Figure out what has happened to the people but be careful, a torch may be your only friend now...

Duration: 15 - 20 min

Move: WASD keys

Interact: E

Sprint: Left shift

Thrilling and exciting game, will surely give you chills!
